haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry

Class OnOffEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry.ScriptEntry
      • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry.OnOffEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scriptable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scriptable>, java.lang.Runnable

    public class OnOffEntry
extends ScriptEntry
    The OnOffEntry class extends the ScriptEntry class. The OnOffEntry class generates an "on" event at the start and an "off" event when the time runs out.
    Author:
    Andreas Basener
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
